Articles.Content: Hello, I'd like to know if anyone knows of any mods that can improve the game's graphics yet still not lag out my game since my computer isn't that great. Thank you.

So, essentially you're saying you want to both have your cake, and also eat it?
"my computer isn't that great" is so subjective it's worthless as a criteria for mod recommendation. Try adding some hardware specs and a list of those mods you have already tried, then you might get suggestions... though there are really only a few graphics mods to pick from.
SVE and Scatterer both run just fine on my machine, but since I don't know what yours is... ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
